blogPost.excerpt: Crowdfunded provides a database with extensive data on 2,000+ crowdfunding campaigns. You can use it to understand customer demand, discover successful product categories, see what competitors are launching, and find promising product ideas.
blogPost.body: Crowdfunded provides a database with extensive data on 2,000+ crowdfunding campaigns. You can use it to understand customer demand, discover successful product categories, see what competitors are launching, and find promising product ideas.
blogPost.title: Crowdfunded - A database of 2,000+ crowdfunding campaigns
blogPost.author: Marco Spoerl

localize.description: 众筹提供了一个数据库，其中包含2000多个众筹活动的大量数据。您可以使用它来了解客户需求、发现成功的产品类别、查看竞争对手正在推出的产品，以及找到有前途的产品想法。
localize.tagline: 包含2000多个众筹活动的数据库

localize.description: 衆籌提供了一個數據庫，其中包含2000多個衆籌活動的大量數據。您可以使用它來了解客戶需求、發現成功的產品類別、查看競爭對手正在推出的產品，以及找到有前途的產品想法。
localize.tagline: 包含2000多個衆籌活動的數據庫
